What does that mean?
Original equipment manufacturer. Meaning the software comes without the fancy box. Meaning it is sold at a significantly lower price.
Appon.us sells OEM VERSIONS of autodesk software at low prices. I for one, think it's legit.

WRITING.TITLE: I have a question. Why do we watch films?
WRITING.TEXT: Yeah. Why do we take our children to see the latest flick? Why do teens flock to movies like Guardians of The Galaxy and 2014's TMNT? Why do we watch movies? Why do people care? The answer is the reason why we make a living out of this. So, I ask again, why do humans watch movies?

WRITING.TITLE: Quick and simple question? How does one read numbers like 5e+33?
I said damn during school and got in trouble when I was 13. Still haven't told my parents years later...
[Algebra Highschool] Having utmost difficulty?
WRITING.TEXT: X+y+z=15 2x-y+3z=-15 -x-y+z=-7 (Hint: solve for z and get two equations to have x and y only.) I don't know how to use this with subsitution. The best way would to. E to use process of elimination.
Thank you so MUCH
